name: DefaultChampionshipsWon
displayName: Number of not repeated default championship the player won

name: StockChampionshipsWon
displayName: Number of stock car and opala championship the player won

name: PolesF1Series
displayName: Number of pole positions won with F1 series

name: WonRacesF1Series
displayName: Number of won races with F1 series

name: MultiplayerFinishedRaces
displayName: Number of multiplayer races the player has finished

name: TTRankedTracks
displayName: Number of official and not repeated tracks for which the player set a time

name: DefaultChampionshipsWonMask
displayName: Each bit identifies a single default championship

name: TTRankedTracksMask1
displayName: Each bit identifies a single layout

name: TTRankedTracksMask2
displayName: Each bit identifies a single layout

name: CarsDriven
displayName: Number of driven cars with no repetition

name: CarsDrivenMask1
displayName: Each bit identifies a single car
